page.title: 07Warren Farm.
page.content: Mr.Herman works at Warren Farm.He is the farm manager.He has to make sure that everyone has an important job and that a profit is made.Warren Farm has 750 cattle.They are fed on silage and rolled barley,but the calves are given skimmed milk.There are 500 calves bought for the farm every year.Warren Farm has ten barns and covers 1159 acres.There are nine employees.The machines they use are a fertilizer spreader,grain dryer,tractors,forklift trucks,ploughs,seed-drills,sprayers,a LandRover and two cars.Warren Farm has various breeds of cattle.They are Limousin crossed Friesian,Hereford x Friesian and Charolais x Friesian.It is a beef farm.They find the best bull by weighing the calves every three weeks,then they can see how they are progressing,how much beef there is on them.
